entry.title: Ecopax - Foam Hinged Sandwich Container Black 5.94"x 5.5"x 3.38"- 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ecopax
Type: Disposables
Price: 42.99

Ecopax - 225 - Foam Hinged Sandwich Container - 4 x 125/Case

1-Comp, Non-Vented, Hinged Foam Containers, Ceres/Plain
Size: 
5.94 x 5.5 x 3.38

Convenient and efficient, this foam container is perfect for your take out service or packaging patrons' leftovers. From to-go cheesesteaks at your Italian restaurant to cold cut subs in your cafe, this all-purpose clamshell container is a reliable and convenient item for your business. The design is ideal for hot and cold subs, side orders, appetizers, kids' meals, and more! Featuring a hinged lid, this container can be quickly and easily closed to keep up with the fast-paced environment of your restaurant or take out venue.

With secure closure tabs, this tightly sealed container is protected against accidental openings and spills during transport, giving your guests peace of mind knowing their meal is tightly contained. Plus, the insulated foam construction ensures your patrons' food remains hot or chilled until they are ready to eat, plus the foam material makes it a more cost-efficient option over other materials.

Streamline your takeout service with this foam hinged lid container. Made of foamed polystyrene, this container is conveniently lightweight, but still able to support heavy foods. To prevent unwanted messes and spills, this container features a double locking lid closure, allowing for safe, convenient transport. Plus, the non-absorbent foam construction prevents any liquids from leaking through. With the ability to hold cold and hot foods, this foam vessel is great for serving guests at your picnic, party, or catered event!

Featuring a classic hinged lid design, this container offers convenience and a compact style to suit your takeout needs. In addition, each container has molded-in stacking rims, allowing customers to safely carry multiple meals at once. This clamshell container is also insulated to reduce heat transfer, and keep hot and cold dishes at the proper serving temperature throughout an entire meal. Once all the food is gone, enjoy a quick and effortless clean-up thanks to its convenient disposability.

entry.title: SB-SP-0054 Dinner Top Fold 9" x 4 3/4" x 2 9/16" Food Container - 250/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 57.99

Send your delicious food home with guests in this paper take-out container!

From entrees to desserts, customers can enjoy their leftovers in style thanks to this take out Box. Great for your bakery, restaurant, bistro, or catered event, this versatile container is the perfect size for entrees, sides, and desserts. It's an excellent option to house a variety of foods, while the attractive color provides a professional feel for your customer's food-to-go.

With four flaps and a tab lock on top, this container ensures that your patrons' food stays fresh and at the perfect temperature, and also that no spills or messes occur during transportation.

This sustainable product is ideal for businesses wishing to reduce ecological impact. Plut, it features a poly-coated interior that makes it leak- and grease-resistant.

No need to worry about retrieving or washing. Once guests are done, they can simply dispose of this container for easy, hassle-free clean up!

Foldable paper boxes are great for take-out foods, rice, pasta, chicken wings, sandwiches and salads.

entry.title: Titan - Half Size Shallow Aluminum Steam Table Pans - 500/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Titan
Type: Disposables
Price: 46.99

Conserve your food's temperature and enhance your presentation with this Half-size foil steam table pan!

Great for cooking, storing, and serving all your entrees, sides, appetizers, and desserts, this versatile pan is perfect for banquets and events of any size. It provides unparalleled temperature retention and can hold up to 104 fl. oz. of your signature menu items.

Aluminum Foil Construction

Durable 35 gauge aluminum foil will stay strong throughout the entirety of your event while providing a polished look.

Full Curl Rim

Flexible rim can be easily bent to cover all the pan's edges.

Designed for Easy Stacking

Allows users to compactly store and transport pans on top of one another.

entry.title: Titan - Foil Lids for Half Size Aluminum Steam Pans - 100/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Titan
Type: Disposables
Price: 36.99

Details

Conserve your food's hot temperature with this Half size foil steam table pan lid. Perfectly sized to fit your half size steam table pan (sold separately), this lid provides a tight seal for your sides, appetizers, and desserts! All you need to do is press the foil around the pan's rim in order to keep your food at its ideal temperature.

Made of 30 gauge aluminum foil, this durable lid enables you to compactly store and transport food pans for your catered event or banquet without worrying about loss of heat. Plus, the disposable design is ideal for quick cleanup at your event's conclusion. It's also recyclable, so you can be environmentally conscious with your take-out service! Until you're ready to unveil your scrumptious food, provide a polished appearance on your buffet line with this lid!

Designing and creating products with the cost-efficient consumer in mind, provides high-quality items for a low, economical price, and this product is no exception. For an easy solution to your take out needs, look no further than this food storage solution !

Price: 56.99

Enjay Converters B-BLK-885 Details

Package and transport your carefully prepared baked goods with this Enjay B-BLK-885 8" x 8" x 5" black cake / bakery box! Made from strong recycled fiberboard materials, this box will hold up to your heavy cakes and is a great option for eco-conscious bakeries and catering businesses. Its convenient one piece, lock corner design allows box to be shipped flat for easy storage and then easily assembled in a matter of seconds when it is ready to be used.

This bakery box's shiny film laminated coating resists fingerprints showing on the outside of the box during transport, and is perfect for adding pressure-sensitive labels for personalization! Best of all, this box is designed for single-service use and can be recycled, making cleanup a breeze at the end of your event.

entry.title: Polar Pak - 5" Extra Deep Dome Hinged Clear Pie/Cake Slice Container - 300/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Polar Pak
Type: Disposables
Price: 113.99

 

Polar Pak - 503230 - 5" High Dome Hinged Clear OPS Plastic Pie / Cake Slice Container

Showcase every layer of your bakery, restaurant, or grocery store's cakes and pies with this Polar Pak 503230 5" clear plastic hinged container. This container's high dome lid is great for slices of mile-high pies, meringue pies with a heavy layer of whipped toppings, and layer cakes. Use this container's crystal clear lid to set up eye-catching displays. Then use its efficient design to enable your bakery or grocery store's customers to select containers and carry them home with ease.

Made of durable polyethylene (PETE) plastic with wide ribbing along the sides for added strength, this plastic protects your baked goods. It's resistant to water and oxygen, and does not transmit exterior odors to food products. Plus, this container's durability enables you to stack containers for compact presentation and transportation. Meanwhile, this triangular container's rounded corners prevent your crusts from crumbling after slightly bumping into the edge.

This container's hinged lid and one round lock tab ensures the lid remains securely sealed, but also opens effortlessly. The open tab is located on the front tip of the container, incorporating it into the triangular design. No need to transfer your baked goods to another container, this packaging makes an excellent plate as patrons can eat directly from the container.

Overall Dimensions:
Length: 5 3/8"
Maximum Width: 4 3/8"
Minimum Width: 1 3/4"
Base Height: 2 1/10"
Lid Height: 2 1/10"
Total Height: 4 3/16"

entry.title: HFA Gourmet To Go - 72 Oz Large Entree Container Gold/Black With Dome Lids -50/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: HFA Gourmet To Go
Type: Disposables
Price: 106.99

HFA - 4203-70-50WDL Large Gourmet To Go Aluminum Foil Takeout Container Combo Gold/Black With Dome Lids -50/Case

HFA - Gourmet To Go Foil Pan Large Gold/Black With Clear Dome Lids

Whether your customers are taking home leftovers, picking up take-home orders, or buying a freshly-cooked meal out of your food truck, this take-out container is the perfect choice. The small size of this container makes it perfect for taking home small entrees, as well as sides and appetizers.

For conveniently heating and reheating your food, this container is oven and grill safe so that products can be simply popped onto the heat. This container is also disposable so that you can simply throw it out after use, saving you time on clean up. With contrasting black and gold colors, this take-out pan will add a high-end look to your to-go service!

The foil material is puncture-resistant to ensure that your food stays secure and will not leak out. In addition, the ribbed PET plastic lid rolls securely onto the edge of the pan to further ensure that your food stays in place. This take-out pan is perfect for grab-and-go use since it presents a polished look even as it keeps your food contained and fresh.

HFA - 4203-70-50WDL Large Gourmet To Go Microwavable Aluminum container / Pans With Clear Dome Lids
